title: Chat Log- Perma deserved or?
body:
Alright, Game 1 got a little heated and its a shame you cant see their posts, but regardless its what I said, but Game 2? There is no context that i find at all slightly reportable....First of all the "idiot" at the end was me when I engaged in a 1v3 and died that was directed toward myself. we legit had a renekton in ranked inting mid game. I do not see how GAME 2 was resulting in my perma ban Especially since i just came out of a 2 week suspension and that chat log was from before that ban. Cant create a ticket because it wont log me in to website as it says error.....Website just as good as the algorithms coded into game xd

Game 1
Dr Fr0do: u2
Dr Fr0do: could went fucking nasus support
Dr Fr0do: and win
Dr Fr0do: mf?
Dr Fr0do: go b
Dr Fr0do: goin b

Dr Fr0do: What are you

Dr Fr0do: No respawn their bro
Dr Fr0do: anyways muted faker

Dr Fr0do: Report kass he called u trash
Dr Fr0do: i defended you
Dr Fr0do: 3 bot kass fucking last hitting
Dr Fr0do: not pushing
Dr Fr0do: basic medchanics bro
Dr Fr0do: So i miss a hook and kass wants to ping instead of play
Dr Fr0do: PING AGAIN
Dr Fr0do: Your muted so idk if you talk bud
Dr Fr0do: btw id have ur cs at 13 min in
Dr Fr0do: so
Dr Fr0do: u need wokr
Dr Fr0do: I know hes typing because he stands still yet he dont know word muted
Dr Fr0do: Kass needs stopwatch so he stops feeding
Dr Fr0do: I cant help myself, jsut funny how you have mroe deaths than anyone and your kass can constantly flash
Dr Fr0do: against a noob team and zhonyas
Dr Fr0do: ok ill stop noqw
Dr Fr0do: 26 you
Dr Fr0do: You duo with him?
Dr Fr0do: Ill shut your mouth up too keyboard warrior
Dr Fr0do: It pisses me of honestly your udner 20 hiding behind a comp screen
Dr Fr0do: If our team had logic
Dr Fr0do: LOL
Dr Fr0do: gg
Dr Fr0do: ya fps..
Dr Fr0do: cant fix bad like you cant fix stupid
Game 2
Dr Fr0do: ;/

Dr Fr0do: ?

replies.body:
Well, just by taking a glance I was drawn to this bit which definitely crosses the line between friendly banter and just not okay in any context. 

> Dr Fr0do: Ill put you in hospital in rl

If you want to open up a discussion about whether or not that deserves a ban though, you'll need to hit up our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Deserved. If you can't see why your chat privileges were revoked then IDK what else to say to you.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
the best part will be when they get worse than that next time

I said GAME 1 is deserved. Game 2 In my opinion nothing said was reportable. But both were considered in MY Perma ban. Not chat restriction. also I cant make a ticket it says error everytime I try to make one. Soooo ya.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Fr0do,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lRPzId4N,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-21T04:44:41.517+0000)
>
> I said GAME 1 is deserved. Game 2 In my opinion nothing said was reportable. But both were considered in MY Perma ban. Not chat restriction. also I cant make a ticket it says error everytime I try to make one. Soooo ya.

You chat way too much when you really shouldn't. You aren't communicating any information other than putting people down and cussing. Why do you think doing this is okay?
